## Type of Change

<!-- Check the relevant option -->

- [ ] :bug: Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] :sparkles: New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] :boom: Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)
- [ ] :memo: Documentation update
- [ ] :recycle: Refactoring (no functional changes)
- [ ] :lipstick: UI/Style changes
- [ ] :white_check_mark: Test updates
- [ ] :technologist: Developer experience / tooling
